00041 #define ACCESS_NOACCESS         MIB_ACCESS_NOACCESS

00043 #define ACCESS_CREATE           MIB_ACCESS_CREATE
00044 #define STATUS_MANDATORY        MIB_STATUS_MANDATORY
00045 #define STATUS_OPTIONAL         MIB_STATUS_OPTIONAL
00046 #define STATUS_OBSOLETE         MIB_STATUS_OBSOLETE
00047 #define STATUS_DEPRECATED       MIB_STATUS_DEPRECATED

00049     /*
00050      * From smnp_impl.h

00052 #define INTEGER     ASN_INTEGER
00053 #define STRING      ASN_OCTET_STR
00054 #define OBJID       ASN_OBJECT_ID
00055 #define NULLOBJ     ASN_NULL
00056 #define BITSTRING   ASN_BIT_STR /* HISTORIC - don't use */
00057 #define IPADDRESS   ASN_IPADDRESS
00058 #define COUNTER     ASN_COUNTER
00059 #define GAUGE       ASN_GAUGE

00122         /*
00123          * ============================
00124          * *
00125          * * MIB-II data structures
00126          * *    (from mib.h) 
00127          * *
00128          * * ============================ 
00129          */

00131 
00132 struct mib_system {
00133     char            sysDescr[32];       /* textual description */
00134     u_char          sysObjectID[16];    /* OBJECT IDENTIFIER of system */
00135     u_char          ObjIDLen;   /* length of sysObjectID */
00136     u_int           sysUpTime;  /* Uptime in 100/s of a second */
00137 };
00138 
00139 struct mib_interface {
00140     int             ifNumber;   /* number of interfaces */
00141 };
00142 
00143 struct mib_ifEntry {
00144     int             ifIndex;    /* index of this interface  */
00145     char            ifDescr[32];        /* english description of interface */
00146     int             ifType;     /* network type of device   */
00147     int             ifMtu;      /* size of largest packet in bytes  */
00148     u_int           ifSpeed;    /* bandwidth in bits/sec    */
00149     u_char          ifPhysAddress[11];  /* interface's address */
00150     u_char          PhysAddrLen;        /* length of physAddr */
00151     int             ifAdminStatus;      /* desired state of interface */
00152     int             ifOperStatus;       /* current operational status */
00153     u_int           ifLastChange;       /* value of sysUpTime when current state entered */
00154     u_int           ifInOctets; /* number of octets received on interface */
00155     u_int           ifInUcastPkts;      /* number of unicast packets delivered */
00156     u_int           ifInNUcastPkts;     /* number of broadcasts or multicasts */
00157     u_int           ifInDiscards;       /* number of packets discarded with no error */
00158     u_int           ifInErrors; /* number of packets containing errors */
00159     u_int           ifInUnknownProtos;  /* number of packets with unknown protocol */
00160     u_int           ifOutOctets;        /* number of octets transmitted */
00161     u_int           ifOutUcastPkts;     /* number of unicast packets sent */
00162     u_int           ifOutNUcastPkts;    /* number of broadcast or multicast pkts */
00163     u_int           ifOutDiscards;      /* number of packets discarded with no error */
00164     u_int           ifOutErrors;        /* number of pkts discarded with an error */
00165     u_int           ifOutQLen;  /* number of packets in output queue */
00166 };
00167 
00168 struct mib_atEntry {
00169     int             atIfIndex;  /* interface on which this entry maps */
00170     u_char          atPhysAddress[11];  /* physical address of destination */
00171     u_char          PhysAddressLen;     /* length of atPhysAddress */
00172     u_int           atNetAddress;       /* IP address of physical address */
00173 };
00174 
00175 struct mib_ip {
00176     int             ipForwarding;       /* 1 if gateway, 2 if host */
00177     int             ipDefaultTTL;       /* default TTL for pkts originating here */
00178     u_int           ipInReceives;       /* no. of IP packets received from interfaces */
00179     u_int           ipInHdrErrors;      /* number of pkts discarded due to header errors */
00180     u_int           ipInAddrErrors;     /* no. of pkts discarded due to bad address */
00181     u_int           ipForwDatagrams;    /* number pf pkts forwarded through this entity */
00182     u_int           ipInUnknownProtos;  /* no. of local-addressed pkts w/unknown proto */
00183     u_int           ipInDiscards;       /* number of error-free packets discarded */
00184     u_int           ipInDelivers;       /* number of datagrams delivered to upper level */
00185     u_int           ipOutRequests;      /* number of IP datagrams originating locally */
00186     u_int           ipOutDiscards;      /* number of error-free output IP pkts discarded */
00187     u_int           ipOutNoRoutes;      /* number of IP pkts discarded due to no route */
00188     int             ipReasmTimeout;     /* seconds fragment is held awaiting reassembly */
00189     u_int           ipReasmReqds;       /* no. of fragments needing reassembly (here) */
00190     u_int           ipReasmOKs; /* number of fragments reassembled */
00191     u_int           ipReasmFails;       /* number of failures in IP reassembly */
00192     u_int           ipFragOKs;  /* number of datagrams fragmented here */
00193     u_int           ipFragFails;        /* no. pkts unable to be fragmented here */
00194     u_int           ipFragCreates;      /* number of IP fragments created here */
00195 };
00196 
00197 struct mib_ipAddrEntry {
00198     u_int           ipAdEntAddr;        /* IP address of this entry */
00199     int             ipAdEntIfIndex;     /* IF for this entry */
00200     u_int           ipAdEntNetMask;     /* subnet mask of this entry */
00201     int             ipAdEntBcastAddr;   /* read the MIB for this one */
00202     int             ipAdEntReasmMaxSize;
00203                 /* max size for dg reassembly   {ipAddrEntry 5} */
00204 };
00205 
00206 struct mib_ipRouteEntry {
00207     u_int           ipRouteDest;        /* destination IP addr for this route */
00208     int             ipRouteIfIndex;     /* index of local IF for this route */
00209     int             ipRouteMetric1;     /* Primary routing metric */
00210     int             ipRouteMetric2;     /* Alternate routing metric */
00211     int             ipRouteMetric3;     /* Alternate routing metric */
00212     int             ipRouteMetric4;     /* Alternate routing metric */
00213     u_int           ipRouteNextHop;     /* IP addr of next hop */
00214     int             ipRouteType;        /* Type of this route */
00215     int             ipRouteProto;       /* How this route was learned */
00216     int             ipRouteAge; /* No. of seconds since updating this route */
00217 };
00218 
00219 struct mib_icmp {
00220     u_int           icmpInMsgs; /* Total of ICMP msgs received */
00221     u_int           icmpInErrors;       /* Total of ICMP msgs received with errors */
00222     u_int           icmpInDestUnreachs;
00223     u_int           icmpInTimeExcds;
00224     u_int           icmpInParmProbs;
00225     u_int           icmpInSrcQuenchs;
00226     u_int           icmpInRedirects;
00227     u_int           icmpInEchos;
00228     u_int           icmpInEchoReps;
00229     u_int           icmpInTimestamps;
00230     u_int           icmpInTimestampReps;
00231     u_int           icmpInAddrMasks;
00232     u_int           icmpInAddrMaskReps;
00233     u_int           icmpOutMsgs;
00234     u_int           icmpOutErrors;
00235     u_int           icmpOutDestUnreachs;
00236     u_int           icmpOutTimeExcds;
00237     u_int           icmpOutParmProbs;
00238     u_int           icmpOutSrcQuenchs;
00239     u_int           icmpOutRedirects;
00240     u_int           icmpOutEchos;
00241     u_int           icmpOutEchoReps;
00242     u_int           icmpOutTimestamps;
00243     u_int           icmpOutTimestampReps;
00244     u_int           icmpOutAddrMasks;
00245     u_int           icmpOutAddrMaskReps;
00246 };
00247 
00248 struct mib_tcp {
00249     int             tcpRtoAlgorithm;    /* retransmission timeout algorithm */
00250     int             tcpRtoMin;  /* minimum retransmission timeout (mS) */
00251     int             tcpRtoMax;  /* maximum retransmission timeout (mS) */
00252     int             tcpMaxConn; /* maximum tcp connections possible */
00253     u_int           tcpActiveOpens;     /* number of SYN-SENT -> CLOSED transitions */
00254     u_int           tcpPassiveOpens;    /* number of SYN-RCVD -> LISTEN transitions */
00255     u_int           tcpAttemptFails;    /*(SYN-SENT,SYN-RCVD)->CLOSED or SYN-RCVD->LISTEN */
00256     u_int           tcpEstabResets;     /* (ESTABLISHED,CLOSE-WAIT) -> CLOSED */
00257     u_int           tcpCurrEstab;       /* number in ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT state */
00258     u_int           tcpInSegs;  /* number of segments received */
00259     u_int           tcpOutSegs; /* number of segments sent */
00260     u_int           tcpRetransSegs;     /* number of retransmitted segments */
00261 };
00262 
00263 struct mib_tcpConnEntry {
00264     int             tcpConnState;       /* State of this connection */
00265     u_int           tcpConnLocalAddress;        /* local IP address for this connection */
00266     int             tcpConnLocalPort;   /* local port for this connection */
00267     u_int           tcpConnRemAddress;  /* remote IP address for this connection */
00268     int             tcpConnRemPort;     /* remote port for this connection */
00269 };
00270 
00271 struct mib_udp {
00272     u_int           udpInDatagrams;     /* No. of UDP datagrams delivered to users */
00273     u_int           udpNoPorts; /* No. of UDP datagrams to port with no listener */
00274     u_int           udpInErrors;        /* No. of UDP datagrams unable to be delivered */
00275     u_int           udpOutDatagrams;    /* No. of UDP datagrams sent from this entity */
00276 };
00277 
00278 struct mib_egp {
00279     u_int           egpInMsgs;  /* No. of EGP msgs received without error */
00280     u_int           egpInErrors;        /* No. of EGP msgs received with error */
00281     u_int           egpOutMsgs; /* No. of EGP msgs sent */
00282     u_int           egpOutErrors;       /* No. of (outgoing) EGP msgs dropped due to error */
00283 };
00284 
00285 struct mib_egpNeighEntry {
00286     int             egpNeighState;      /* local EGP state with this entry's neighbor */
00287     u_int           egpNeighAddr;       /* IP address of this entry's neighbor */
00288 };
